DOCNAME: MANAS AND MANASOVA v. THE CZECH REPUBLIC
JUDGES: Javier Borrego Borrego;Karel Jungwiert;Margarita Tsatsa-Nikolovska;Mark Villiger;Peer Lorenzen;Renate Jaeger;Volodymyr Butkevych
TEXT: The applicants , Mr PERSON and PERSON , are CARDINAL NORP nationals who were born in DATE and DATE respectively , and live in GPE .

On DATE ORG ( krajský obchodní soud ) declared Wall Street , spol . s r.o . bankrupt , appointed a trustee in bankruptcy ( správce konkurzní podstaty ) and invited the company ’s creditors to submit and prove their claims .
On DATE the applicants submitted their claims of CZK CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL ) .
In a letter of CARDINAL DATE the ORG in bankruptcy informed the applicants that their claims had been confirmed .

In reply to the ORG complaint of CARDINAL DATE about delays in the proceedings , the vice - president of ORG ( městský soud ) , to which the case had been transferred , admitted that the bankruptcy proceedings had been lengthy .
On DATE ORG invited the trustee in bankruptcy to complete , clarify and prove a number of facts relating to the bankruptcy proceedings .
On DATE ORG approved a final report on the realisation of the assets in bankruptcy . On an unspecified date in DATE ORG upheld the approval .

On DATE the applicants applied for compensation pursuant to Act no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL as amended . In a letter of CARDINAL DATE ORG informed them that their application had been accepted , and that a finding of a violation of their right to a hearing within a reasonable time constituted in itself sufficient satisfaction for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage they might have sustained .
On DATE the applicants informed the Registry that they did not intend to turn to a court under section CARDINAL(CARDINAL ) of Act no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL as amended .

The relevant domestic law and practice concerning remedies for the allegedly excessive length of judicial proceedings are set out in the ORG ’s decision in the case of PERSON v. GPE , no . MONEY ( dec . ) , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL , DATE ) .
